original_text: They are my people and they come as a crowd to listen to you. They sit and they listen to your words. But they do not obey what you say. They say that they love me. But really they like to cheat people to get things for themselves.
korean_text: 백성이 모이는 것 같이 네게 나아오며 내 백성처럼 네 앞에 앉아서 네 말을 들으나 그대로 행하지 아니하니 이는 그 입으로는 사랑을 나타내어도 마음으로는 이익을 따름이라

sentences.original_text: and they come as a crowd to listen to you.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 무리로 모여 네 말을 들으러 온다.

sentences.original_text: and they listen to your words.
But they do not obey what you say.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그들은 네가 말하는 것을 순종하지 않는다.

sentences.original_text: They say that they love me.
But really they like to cheat people
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 사실 그들은 사람들을 속이는 것을 좋아하며
